devDesc: | Quality Assurance Technologist | Junior Mechanical Engineer
aboutDescription: Hi, I'm Miriam! I am a recent Master of Science Engineering graduate seeking to exploit my skills and talents within a creative role. Currently, I am working as a Quality Assurance Technologist at One Retail Group, where I primarily ensure that products meet strict quality and regulatory compliance standards by planning and overseeing the inspection, testing, construction checks and product technical file compliance documentation. Over the lockdown period I have invested my time in learning new skills and languages. I additionally completed personal projects allowing me to grow my skills within the innovation and technology sector.
